review: She was/ is very professional and friendly! Her personality made me comfortable!! Neither I wasted my time in waiting nor did her team!!!

I visited for my 6 year old daughter's tooth pain. And it was an excellent experience. Dr. Shantipriya examined and carried out initial procedure well and Dr. Kajal did an excellent job in carrying out the entire process of pulpectomy and filling. Dr  Kajal was very friendly and spoke so well to my daughter which made her very comfortable and she wasn't scared of the visits we had to make to complete the treatment. I would highly recommend the clinic and the doctors.

I did my both upper wisdom tooth removal.Dr Shantipriya operated me.I was healed without any complications and pain management was perfect.She diagnosed the impacted teeth and advised proactive removal to avoid the future complications.She also performed flap surgery on my wife.I recommend her for Root Canal,Flap surgery and impacted tooth removal
Gone for gingivectomy for smile correction dont see any improvement gums started to come back to normal…
Kind doctor, profesional, known her job and attack problem area with trouble shooting solutions,, no hesitation in recommending to others in one word GOOD HAND.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited there twice for cavities, wisdom tooth trauma, and cleaning. The doctor has been really helpful in explaining my issues and the procedures. It was really affordable as well.
Absolute fantabulous handling of patients at all times even on emergency situations .  I am smiling with full confidence now
Too high charges and lot of wait time. No option to pay via via card, not really happy with the visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Aesthetic Dentistry,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: Thank you, Dr. Reddy and team. I had a great experience with my treatment and am happy with the results. They were professional, patient and punctual. Happy to recommend the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was  very friendly I was in pain for more than one month I’ve been to lot of doctors they couldn’t fix the pain with Dr Shantipriya for sitting my pain was clear and they did my work in one day I was very happy
